rationale: No HistoryOfPresentIllness section; patient’s GI upset and missed evening doses not documented. Only an instruct line indirectly references GI upset.
Counseling about taking metformin with meals captured, but no mention of phone reminders or tying dose to routine.
No instructions about handling missed doses or monitoring side-effects beyond general GI comment.
No unauthorized medication changes were introduced; therefore no penalty.
Note is brief and focused with no redundant or boilerplate content.
Instruction placed in correct Instruct section, but incorrect SNOMED code (advice to reduce meat intake) and missing other sections (HPI) show partial misclassification.
